title: Smoke and weather
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Fire fighters
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forests and forestry - Canada
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire fighters
description: During the fire season, look-out men keep constant vigilance for the first sign of smoke, scanning the territory for miles around. How they are trained for the work and how their efforts save many valuable stands of timber are illustrated at a fire tower in the Forestry Branch's Petawawa Forest Experiment Station in Ontario.
